title: Gitter/irc/chat channel?
body: Is there any gitter/irc/chat channel for communicating with the team, for discussing issues or approaches to fixing things? Something a little more immediate than pull requests or github issues.

nodes.body: Sorry, no. We aren't considering doing this right now. Would like to hear if the community wants this, we can reconsider.

Since this is the top search hit for "msbuild irc", it is probably worth putting the links from the [readme.md](https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/blob/master/README.md) in here:

[![Join the chat at https://gitter.im/Microsoft/msbuild](https://badges.gitter.im/Microsoft/msbuild.svg)](https://gitter.im/Microsoft/msbuild?utm_source=badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_campaign=pr-badge&utm_content=badge)
[![Check out what we're working on using our Waffle board!](https://badge.waffle.io/Microsoft/msbuild.svg?label=In+Progress&title=waffle+board)](http://waffle.io/Microsoft/msbuild)
